## ShortcutRegistry.KeyboardShortcut.callback property

The function to be called when the shorctut is invoked.

**Signature:**

```typescript
callback?: (workspace: WorkspaceSvg, e: Event, shortcut: KeyboardShortcut, scope: Scope) => boolean;
```
